effect.sun-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.
effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 30% chance to confuse the target. This move can hit Pokémon under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop. During rain dance, this move has 100% accuracy. During sunny day, this move has 50% accuracy.

short_effect.sun-moon: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.
short_effect.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: Has a 30% chance to confuse the target.

flavor_text.sun-moon: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: The user attacks by wrapping its opponent in a fierce wind that flies up into the sky. This may also confuse the target.
